definition: Sanmenxia prefecture level city in Henan

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: What do you think of Sanmenxia city?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲三門峽市怎麼樣？

sentences.english: In 1921 the first time in Sanmenxia City, Henan Mianchi Xian Yangshao Village found.
sentences.chinese: 1921年首次在河南省三門峽市澠池縣仰韶村發現。

sentences.english: No. 8 tomb at Penjingyuan in Sanmenxia city is a coffin tomb in the early Warring States period.
sentences.chinese: 三門峽市盆景園8號戰國墓爲戰國早期偏晚的棺槨墓。
